resources.string: The Cave
Die
What will you do?
\*Continue\*
You wake up inside what appears to be some kind of cave. You sit and wonder for a while. You have no idea how you got here. All you can remember is your name. What was that again?
Aaah yes, that was it: %1$s! Right then %1$s, you\'re in a bit of a sticky situation here. What are you going to do first?
Stand up and look around
Pat around to see what you can find
Lay down and cry

The magnitude of your situation is just too much for you to handle, and you collapse to the floor in a heap crying uncontrollably. Your situation goes from bad to worse when you hear a low growl in the distance. You can\'t stifle your cries and the growling gets closer and closer..

A beast of unknown origins pounces out from the darkness. You know this is the end, your last thought as the terrifying creature sinks it\'s teeth into your flesh is, "\"I just wish I had tried something else\""
You stand up and try to look around but you can barely see your own hand outstretched in front of your face. This isn\'t going to work. What\'s your next move?
Fumble around until you hit something
Pat around to see what you can find
Squint your eyes and look harder
You fumble through the pitch black. A stench of damp and decay rises up into your nostrils. Wherever you are, it\'s not a good place to be. You eventually find a wall. What next?

You squint your eyes, almost willing them to adjust to the dark. Unfortunately, it does look like you\'re in a cave! You can make out the walls, and the floor is scattered with rocks and debris. What do you want to do?
Try to break through the wall
Pat around to see what you can find
Scream for help
You pound against the cold, slimy wall like your life depends on it (it might do) but to no avail. There\'s no give. You\'re going to have to try something else!

You\'re feeling hopeless, maybe someone else is nearby. You scream at the top of your lungs. Your voice echoes around the walls. Nothing. Until you hear the words that send a shiver up your spine, "\"It\'s always more fun when they\'re awake\"". You spin round to see three hooded figures approaching. "\"Now what limb should we start with first?\"".
They let out a sickening laugh as you continue to scream, there\'s no escape, there\'s no hope, there\'s no more you can do…
Give up
Pat around to see what you can find (Take the hint)
Scream for help

A feeling of dread washes over you, you were never cut out for this. Your survival instinct just isn\'t strong enough to get you through this ordeal. You lie down on the damp floor, close your eyes and pray that death takes you quickly…

"\"Another body! This one looks like it\'s been here for months\"", proclaims a member of the exploration crew that surrounds your now decaying corpse. "\"What on earth is happening inside this cave, we need to get the hell out of here now!\""
"Game over"
Upon searching the floor, you find a rock much larger than the others amongst the debris.
Pick up the rock
Try something else

You pull the rock but it doesn\'t come away from the ground. Instead, it moves about an inch or so towards you before stopping abruptly. You hear a faint click. Much to your amazement, a wall some way ahead of you appears to slide away, revealing a dim light in the distance. I hope you\'re alone in here, because the screeching of the wall as it slid away would have awoken anyone…
Find somewhere to hide
\"Hello?\"
Follow the light

In the darkness it\'s difficult to see where would be best to hide, but in your infinite wisdom you crouch down by a wall. You are repulsed by the stench as slime from the walls drips down onto your head and neck. In the distance, but getting louder, you hear what sounds like foot prints. \"Maybe it\'s a big friendly giant\" \- You think to yourself.
In the distance, but getting louder, you hear what sounds like foot prints. \"Maybe it\'s a big friendly giant\" \- You think to yourself.
Remain %1$s
\"I mean you no harm\!\"
Stand strong, you could take it on!

The footsteps get faster and louder until the sheer bass of each thud makes you want to be sick! Out of the shadows charges a beast that can only have come from a nightmare. You attempt to run but it has already caught up. In one swift stomp your story has come to an end. Embarrassingly, you didn\'t even make it out of the first room.

You start to walk towards the light in the distance. You notice that you have very little grip on the ground and will have to watch your step to avoid falling. A rhythmic thudding echoes from behind you, getting louder. You probably don\'t want to be here when whatever it is gets here.
Keep walking towards the light
Start to run
Scream for help

Despite your better judgement, you start to run! For about 3 steps, it works brilliantly. However, on the fourth step your grip fails you, and you fall painfully to the ground. You may be able to get away still…

The footsteps get faster and louder until the sheer bass of each thud makes you want to be sick! Out of the shadows charges a beast that can only have come from a nightmare. You\'ll never make it out. You sit and make peace with your last moments…

With a flash of light and a deafening explosion, you are momentarily blinded. Are you dead? After a few seconds you reopen your eyes to see the giant beast laying in front of you. You have no idea whether it is dead or merely knocked out, but you know that somebody or something must have caused this. Perhaps somebody heard your screaming?
